title: Gaseous Form
content:
Gaseous Form Level 3 Transmutation Spell Transform yourself or an ally into a tiny gas cloud. It can't fall, and fits through small openings. It is very hard to damage. The cloud has Advantage on Constitution, Dexterity, and Strength Saving Throws. Until Long Rest While transformed, the target won't be able to attack, cast spells, or talk. Melee Concentration Action Level 3 Spell Slot
